products.name: Workbench
products.shortDescription: Sturdy workbench design with material slots for customizable finishes. Features dynamic material loading.
fullDescription: A sturdy workbench design featuring dynamic material loading. This model demonstrates the material slot system where textures are applied at runtime.
The model uses 'plywood-face' and 'plywood-edge' material slots that receive plywood textures from a shared source file, ensuring consistent appearance across all products.

products.name: Queen Bed
products.shortDescription: Simple queen bed frame design built from plywood. Easy to assemble and disassemble.
fullDescription: A queen bed frame design featuring clean lines and sturdy construction from 3/4" plywood.
Uses 'plywood-face' and 'plywood-edge' material slots for consistent appearance with other furniture pieces.

products.name: Assembly Table
products.shortDescription: Versatile assembly table for workshop projects. Sturdy construction with plywood materials.
fullDescription: A versatile assembly table designed for workshop use. Features sturdy plywood construction for durability.
Uses 'plywood-face' and 'plywood-edge' material slots for consistent appearance with other furniture pieces.

products.name: Lightweight Table
products.shortDescription: Lightweight table design optimized for easy transport and assembly.
fullDescription: A lightweight table design featuring efficient use of materials while maintaining stability and durability.
Uses 'plywood-face' and 'plywood-edge' material slots for consistent appearance with other furniture pieces.
